StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetFYNumShipped]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Organiza.onID as integer, @FiscalYear as integer
AS
SET ARITHABORT ON SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT DISTINCT n.NWA_ID INTO #Shipper FROM MCRISS.dbo.NWA N INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.OFFICER_CONTRACT OFC ON OFC.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.CANDIDATE_STATUS cs ON cs.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID WHERE ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = @Organiza.onID AND N.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE IS NOT NULL AND N.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE IN ('0A', '0B', '0C', '0E', '0F', '1A', '1B', '1C', '1H','1E') AND Mission_Year_Work_For = @FiscalYear AND cs.STATUS_TYPE = 'O' AND cs.STATUS_CODE = 'B' AND cs.DISPOSITION_CODE = 'AP'
SELECT CASE WHEN N.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE IN ('0A', '0B', '0C', '0E', '0F') THEN 'PLC' WHEN N.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE IN ('1A', '1B', '1C', '1H','1E') THEN 'OCC' END OFFICER_SOURCE_CODE, CASE WHEN N.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE IN ('1A', '1B', '1C', '1H','1E') THEN CASE WHEN [CLASS_NUMBER] = (SELECT MIN (OC.CLASS_NUMBER) FROM OCS_CLASS OC WHERE OC.FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear and TRAINING_TYPE_CODE = 'OCC') THEN 'FALL' WHEN [CLASS_NUMBER] = ( SELECT MAX (OC.CLASS_NUMBER) FROM OCS_CLASS OC WHERE OC.FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear and TRAINING_TYPE_CODE = 'OCC') THEN 'SUMMER' WHEN [CLASS_NUMBER] > (SELECT MIN (OC.CLASS_NUMBER) FROM OCS_CLASS OC WHERE OC.FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear and TRAINING_TYPE_CODE = 'OCC') AND [CLASS_NUMBER] < (SELECT MAX (OC.CLASS_NUMBER) FROM OCS_CLASS OC WHERE OC.FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear and TRAINING_TYPE_CODE = 'OCC') THEN 'WINTER' END ELSE CASE WHEN n.SHIP_MISSION = @FiscalYear + 1 AND oc.TRAINING_TYPE_CODE ='PLCCOMB' THEN 'PLCCOMB' WHEN n.SHIP_MISSION = @FiscalYear + 2 AND ( (oc.TRAINING_TYPE_CODE IN ('PLCJR', 'PLCSR')) OR (oc.TRAINING_TYPE_CODE = 'PLCCOMB' AND N.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE = '0E') ) THEN 'PLCSCR' WHEN n.SHIP_MISSION = @FiscalYear + 3 AND ( (oc.TRAINING_TYPE_CODE IN ('PLCJR', 'PLCSR')) OR (oc.TRAINING_TYPE_CODE = 'PLCCOMB' AND N.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE = '0E') ) THEN 'PLCJR' END END AS TRAINING_TYPE_CODE, CASE N.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE WHEN '0A' THEN 'NFO' WHEN '0B' THEN 'G' WHEN '0C' THEN 'A' WHEN '0E' THEN 'L' WHEN '1A' THEN 'L' WHEN '1B' THEN 'G' WHEN '1C' THEN 'A' WHEN '1H' THEN 'NFO' WHEN '1E' THEN 'OCCR GRND' WHEN '0F' THEN 'PLCR GRND' END AS COMPONENT_CODE, OC.CLASS_NUMBER AS CLASS_NUMBER, CASE WHEN (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) IN ('AA', 'C1','C2','C3','C4','C5','C6','C7','C9','CA','CB','CD','CE','CF','CG','CH','CJ', 'CK','CL','CP','CQ','CS','CT','CV','CW','CZ', 'EA','FA') THEN 'AA' WHEN (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) IN ('EP','EZ','FP','FZ') THEN 'W' WHEN (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) IN ('A4','A6','A9','AB','AS','BB','DB','E1','E4','E6','E9','EB','ES','F1','F4','F6', 'F9','FB','FS') THEN 'H' ELSE 'O' END AS DIVERSITY_CODE, MC.GENDER_CODE AS GENDER_CODE, N.[NWA_ID] AS NWA_ID, N.rowguid AS NWAGUID, PER.[Last_Name] AS LAST_NAME, PER.[First_Name] AS FIRST_NAME, PER.[Legal_Middle_Name] AS MIDDLE_NAME, PHONE.area_code + PHONE.telephone_number AS PHONE_NUMBER
FROM NWA N
INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT OFC ON OFC.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID INNER JOIN OCS O ON O.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID INNER JOIN OCS_CLASS OC ON OC.CLASS_ID = O.OCS_CLASS_ID inner join MARINE_CANDIDATE MC ON N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN PERSON PER ON MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = PER.[PERSON_ID] LEFT OUTER JOIN candidate_telephone PHONE ON MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = PHONE.marine_candidate_id and PHONE.telephone_type = 'C' WHERE ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = @Organiza.onID AND N.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE IS NOT NULL AND N.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE IN ('0A', '0B', '0C', '0E', '0F', '1A', '1B', '1C', '1H','1E') AND Mission_Year_Work_For = @FiscalYear AND N.NWA_ID in (SELECT NWA_ID FROM #Shipper)
DROP TABLE #Shipper
SET NOCOUNT OFF
